channel.title: Rust on Fake瑞克的技术博客
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Fake瑞克的技术博客

item.title: Rust配置STM32嵌入式开发环境
item.description: 安装 安装cargo工具 cargo install cargo-generate 安装stlink v2驱动 sudo apt-get install git make cmake libusb-1.0-0-dev sudo apt-get install gcc build-essential git clone https://github.com/stlink-org/stlink.git cd stlink/ mkdir build cd build cmake .. make cd bin/ sudo cp st-* /usr/local/bin cd ../lib/ sudo cp *.so* /lib32 cd ../../ sudo cp config/udev/rules.d/49-stlinkv* /etc/udev/rules.d/ 安装烧录和调试的工具 Linux, macOS curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -LsSf https://github.com/probe-rs/probe-rs/releases/latest/download/probe-rs-tools-installer.sh | sh WIndows irm https://github.com/probe-rs/probe-rs/releases/latest/download/probe-rs-tools-installer.ps1 | iex 安装适用于ARM Cortex-M目标的rust-std组件 rustup target add thumbv6m-none-eabi thumbv7m-none-eabi thumbv7em-none-eabi thumbv7em-none-eabihf
